issue.title: Не работают страницы релизов на online.anidub.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

online.anidub.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, RU AdList - Counters, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

After enabling/disabling filters, I found that problems with `online.anidub.com` caused by `AdGuard Russian filter` when used by `uBlock Origin` with filters I checked above + 6 built-in uBlock filters.
This issue does NOT appear on root pages: online.anidub.com, online.anidub.com/anime_ongoing, online.anidub.com/anime_tv or online.anidub.com/dorama. It appears only on RELEASES pages (like https://online.anidub.com/anime_ongoing/11560-urusei-yatsura.html)
In uBlock AdGuard Russian filter marked as "external/user filter".

The problem: when `AdGuard Russian filter` enabled, all page content just disappeared, leaving a blank page with AniDub's menu panel at the top of the page.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: wordpress.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://wordpress.com/post/johnjronline.wordpress.com/88546](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwordpress.com%2Fpost%2Fjohnjronline.wordpress.com%2F88546) ### Comment Username: @goodjohnjr > There is a chance that AdGuard DNS's default AdGuard DNS filter is possibly causing an issue on WordPress.com when it blocks pixel.wp.com, where when you are editing a post, the image block when set to a hotlinked image, shrinks very small. > > At first, I thought that it was just a WordPress.com glitch, which has been happening for almost two weeks on almost all my posts, but it went away after I refreshed the page when I switched from AdGuard DNS to Quad9 when I was trying to figure out if Adguard For Windows or Adguard VPN or Adguard DNS was causing the problem; though this was just one quick test, so I am not sure if it will last. > > Anyway, I just wanted to ### Screenshots

But i research, maybay new technology? > But this is not for me, for any People. I like without new technology, I liked Astronomy, but Astrology dont like Astronomy. And Yes, I believe on God, but I not a god. Maybay 50%-50% human, also I dont belive, Iam invirto. > But I have genology, perhaps. > > And i search Wife, but i dont Wife. I have Wife, i don Wife. This is anyweible. > Yes, this is olso horrore. But i how better human. > > I liked recive blood, many blood. I now? I am shit, nobody. jjoke. or not joke. > Please tell me, how makre work.
